pkgmetadata.longdescription: ===Pi첫===.. image:: https://travis-ci.org/zalando-stups/piu.svg?branch=master :target: https://travis-ci.org/zalando-stups/piu :alt: Build Status.. image:: https://coveralls.io/repos/zalando-stups/piu/badge.svg :target: https://coveralls.io/r/zalando-stups/piu :alt: Code Coverage.. image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/dw/stups-piu.svg :target: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/stups-piu/ :alt: PyPI Downloads.. image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/stups-piu.svg :target: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/stups-piu/ :alt: Latest PyPI version.. image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/l/stups-piu.svg :target: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/stups-piu/ :alt: LicensePi첫 is the command line client for the "even" SSH access granting service.Installation============.. code-block:: bash $ sudo pip3 install --upgrade stups-piuUsage=====.. code-block:: bash $ piu myuser@myhost my-reasonSee the `STUPS documentation on Pi첫`_ for details... _STUPS documentation on Pi첫: http://stups.readthedocs.org/en/latest/components/piu.htmlRunning Unit Tests==================.. code-block:: bash $ python3 setup.py test --cov-html=true
